headline.print_headline: 4 Dead After Being Infected by a Device in Surgery at a Pennsylvania Hospital
headline.main: 4 Dead After Being Infected by a Device in Surgery at a Pennsylvania Hospital

snippet: At least eight patients who received treatment at WellSpan York Hospital were infected, and about 1,300 are being notified of possible exposure to harmful bacteria.
abstract: Four people who developed infected from heater-cooler device used during open-heart surgery at WellSpan York Hospital in York, Pa, have died, although it is not yet clear whether infection was primary cause of the deaths.
lead_paragraph: At least eight patients who received treatment at WellSpan York Hospital were infected, and about 1,300 are being notified of possible exposure to harmful bacteria.
